text: Kyle Davis Richardson (born March 2, 1973 in Farmington, Missouri) is a retired American football punter who used to play for the Miami Dolphins, Seattle Seahawks, Baltimore Ravens, Minnesota Vikings, Philadelphia Eagles, Cincinnati Bengals, Cleveland Browns of the NFL. He was on the Baltimore Ravens championship team in 2000 when they won Super Bowl XXXV in 2000. He now works as the vice president of sales & marketing for Caring One, a healthcare information services provider. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile on NFL.com Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Missouri Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:Cincinnati Bengals players Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:American football punters
title: Kyle Richardson
